me.sudofu.sanitycheck
[Groovy] Class BasicSanityChecker

java.lang.Object
  me.sudofu.sanitycheck.SanityChecker
      me.sudofu.sanitycheck.BasicSanityChecker

class BasicSanityChecker
extends SanityChecker

An implementation of SanityChecker which provides mnemonics for sanity-checking various kinds of Classes.

Authors:
Aaron Brown
See Also:
SanityChecker
StringCoerciveSanityChecker

Constructor Detail

BasicSanityChecker

BasicSanityChecker()
Constructs a BasicSanityChecker with the intial behavior of disallowing null to pass sanity checks.

BasicSanityChecker

BasicSanityChecker(boolean allowPassOnNull)
Constructs a BasicSanityChecker, specifying the allowance of null passing sanity cheks.

There are two distinct behaviors of a SanityChecker:

  1. Implicitly check for null, and disallow nulls to pass the sanity check.
  2. Implicitly check for null, and allow nulls to pass the sanity check.
If provided, this behavior can be overridden per sanity check.

isBigDecimal

boolean isBigDecimal()
Run a sanity check to ensure the entity is a(n) BigDecimal.

Default behavior specified by allowPassOnNull

throws:
IllegalStateException An entity must be declared via a check() invokation before any sanity checks can be performed.
Returns:
true if the test passes, false otherwise.
